avalancheActivity.highlights: Moist snow slides are possible from the middle of the day.
avalancheActivity.comment: The early morning will see favourable avalanche conditions generally. As the day progresses on very steep sunny slopes there will be only a slight increase in the danger of moist snow slides. The avalanches can be released by people or triggered naturally.

snowpackStructure.comment:
As a consequence of falling temperatures a crust formed on the surface during the course of the night. These conditions will facilitate a stabilisation of the snowpack by midday in all aspects.
Above approximately 2000 m there are 15 to 20 cm of snow, and even more in some localities. Below approximately 1800 m from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

tendency.highlights: Wednesday: Decrease in danger of moist avalanches as the temperature drops. Slight increase in danger of dry avalanches as a consequence of new snow and wind.
